author: andschwa
body: We didn't catch this in #995 since PowerShell didn't emit an exit code when it failed. `ag` ignored the `.travis.yml` when this change was made. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1002)

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Yeah, that's a bug in the converged host :/

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors actually, it wouldn't even be that. It's not yet been updated to use v0.4, so it's a bug in the _old_ host, yay!

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Good news: Pester tests all (really) still passing. Not sure what's up with xUnit; probably due to SD merge. Will debug tomorrow.

title: Import build.psm1 on Travis
